SELECT G_IDX, PRODUCT1.P_IDX AS P_IDX, PRODUCT1.P_NAME AS P_NAME, CATE_SPEC_LIST, G_BARCODE, G_IMEI, IN_SPEC1.SPEC_LOOKUP AS IN_SPEC1, IN_SPEC2.SPEC_LOOKUP AS IN_SPEC2, SELL_SPEC1.SPEC_LOOKUP AS SELL_SPEC1, SELL_SPEC2.SPEC_LOOKUP AS SELL_SPEC2, PROCESS_SPEC1.SPEC_LOOKUP AS PROCESS_SPEC1, PRODUCT2.P_COST AS P_COST, PP_FIX_COST + PP_PAINT_COST + PP_PROCESS_COST AS TOTAL_PROCESS_COST FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO_RECEIVED ON G_POR_IDX = POR_IDX LEFT JOIN PO_PRODUCT ON POR_PP_IDX = PP_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT AS PRODUCT1 ON G_P_IDX = PRODUCT1.P_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY ON PRODUCT1.P_CATE_IDX = CATE_IDX LEFT JOIN GOODS_STOCK ON G_GS_IDX = GS_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT AS PRODUCT2 ON GS_P_IDX = PRODUCT2.P_IDX LEFT JOIN SPEC AS IN_SPEC1 ON PP_SPEC_IDX = IN_SPEC1.SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SPEC AS SELL_SPEC1 ON PP_SPEC_IDX2 = SELL_SPEC1.SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SPEC AS IN_SPEC2 ON POR_IN_SPEC_IDX = IN_SPEC2.SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SPEC AS SELL_SPEC2 ON G_SELL_SPEC_IDX = SELL_SPEC2.SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SPEC AS PROCESS_SPEC1 ON POR_PROCESS_SPEC_IDX = PROCESS_SPEC1.SPEC_IDX WHERE G_IDX = #{gIdx}

SELECT G_IDX, G_BARCODE, P_NAME, IG_IDX, G_STATE, P_IDX FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX LEFT JOIN IN_GROUP ON PO_IDX = IG_PO_IDX
LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN PO ON G_PO_IDX = PO_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT ON G_P_IDX = P_IDX
